title: Data Scientist - Group Enterprise
description: I built an internal GenAI tool to streamline the bid & tender process for Singtel Enterprise's sales team. I also built core features for a chatbot app to facilitate information retrieval for the service management team.

title: Data Scientist - Group IT
description: I did product analytics to identify improvement opportunities for the MySingtel app and used it to design a POC with better UX. I also drove the R&D of an AI enabled real-time coupon allocator to enhance user experience and conversion rate in the roaming funnel.
tech: Matplotlib, PyTorch, scikit-learn, PuLP, R, FastAPI

title: Data Science Intern
description: I built a feature for a web-app which allows non-technical users to train a neural network with few-shot learning for effective text classification. I also built a feature for users to quickly search through a text database using fulltext indexes.

company: NUS Institute of Operations Research & Analytics
title: Research Assistant (Data Science)
description: I developed novel methods to process textual data to improve classification accuracy.

title: Full Stack Developer Intern
description: I developed a Shopify app which uses AI to recommend clothing sizes to customers given their body dimensions. The app also has an admin panel for merchants to fine-tune the recommendation logic.
tech: MongoDB, ExpressJS, React, GraphQL, scikit-learn, R

title: Data Analyst Intern
description: I maintained Tableau dashboards and conducted database migration.
